0111111011001010 1111110011111100 1 -> sum: 0111101111000111, cout: 1
1001000110110000 1011000101110100 1 -> sum: 0100001100100101, cout: 1
1100010110100000 0001010010100100 1 -> sum: 1101101001000101, cout: 0
1100101000101100 0001000000111110 1 -> sum: 1101101001101011, cout: 0
0110101111110011 0111111010100100 1 -> sum: 1110101010011000, cout: 0

1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
